result.execSummary:
The defendant Tiffany L Slade was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Payment Plan Agreement/Letter of Understanding
from Clerk to Defendant re: Court-ordered Payment Arrangements

1:11 pm
No Appearance by Defendant.  Defendant has made payment arrangements.  Court orders Warrant - stay pending compliance with Payment Plan Agreement.
Court adjourned at 1:12 pm
Payment Plan Agreement/Letter of Understanding
FTP Hearing November 21, 2016, for $563.80
Attorney Joseph Schuessler

9:37 a.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Joseph Schuessler.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Court recites agreement - will recommend a fine and costs.  State concurs.  Atty Schuessler concurs.  Defendant concurs.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty as charged.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  DA confirms compliance with victim witness rights.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Sentencing statement by Atty Schuessler.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

-$80 fine plus court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample. 

Court adjourned at 9:44 a.m.

9:20 a.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Joseph Schuessler.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Schuessler - have discussed this matter and have an agreement and are ready to enter a plea, just need to fill out the plea questionnaire. 

Court adjourned at 9:21 a.m.
Status hearing on July 26, 2016 at 09:15 am.

9:28 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant, was not able to meet with the DA as she was sick.  Court sets for Status Hearing on July 26, 2016 at 9:15 a.m.  Court goes over right to counsel and how to obtain counsel.

Court adjourned at 9:30 a.m.
Status hearing on June 21, 2016 at 09:15 am.

Defendant called and requested an adjournment as she is sick.  Matter adjourned to June 21, 2016 at 9:15 a.m.  Address on file is correct.
43
Status hearing on June 14, 2016 at 09:15 am.

8:53 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant, requests to talk with the District Attorney.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  Court sets for Status Hearing on June 14, 2016 at 9:15 a.m.  Defendant to make appointment with the District Attorney before leaving today.

Court adjourned at 8:55 a.m.
**PROCESSING COMPLETE**
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
Status hearing on May 31, 2016 at 09:15 am.
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

9:30 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his/her right to an attorney.  Defendant enters a plea of NOT GUILTY.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond and conditions of:  Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court will set for Status Hearing on May 31, 2016 at 9:15 a.m.

Court adjourned at 9:31 a.m.
Initial appearance on May 17, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Warrant letter sent to the defendant - respond on or before May 9, 2016 or warrant will be issued.

9:07 a.m.  No Appearance by the defendant.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Court orders a warrant - stayed for ten days.

Court adjourned at 9:07 a.m.
**PROCESSING NEEDED**
